entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers this morning and early this afternoon. Rain beginning this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High 11. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain at times heavy. Low 6.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High 8. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
